description.en: Due to an automatic unmanaged update of the hosting environment, Learnpoint stopped working.
description.sv: En automatisk oövervakad uppdatering av driftsmiljön gjorde att Learnpoint helt slutade att fungera.

description.en: A cache service problem resulted in errors from 15:51 to 16:17. Several requests failed. The problem was solved by a restart of the service.
description.sv: Det uppstod ett problem med en service som hanterar cachning mellan 15:51 to 16:17. Många anrop misslyckades. Problemet löstes genom att starta om servicen.
